column5: Jack that is beautiful!!!  Maureen
Just finished my latest carving, I guess I'm rather pleased with it. Thought I would share it with you all. Took about 30hrs to do and is about 5' x 3'' in size. Now i think my eyes are quiting on me
beautiful lookin job.
Wow, great job  You are very talented.  Joey
Nice one Jack...
Excellent job!   I wish I could do art like that, I love wood working and carving but I just don't think I have what it takes to make something like that, good job
Great job Jack.  Quite the detail
That's some AMAZING work Nanook!!  I just started carving working duck decoys........I suck compared to that......WOW!!!  Sinker
Very impressive. After seeing that I think that I will stick to carving other members of this forum. (everyone except team 8 members of course  ) Jim
VERY well done indeed Jack! Congrats to you. Are you displaying your work anywhere?
Nice. How about some hand carved musky lures?
My wife has got that tatooed on her shoulder !!! Great job
Beautiful job on the carving Nanook.     Curious as to what type of wood you use.

Beautiful piece of craftsmanship nanook Love the details in the hummingbird feathers and the flower  My father-in-law used to carve a lot before he got a computer and would use bass wood for his projects. Again great job and thanks for sharing Leechman
Wow!

Thanks for you comments Folks.  Mukluk.  I use Basswood mostly sometimes Butternut  ChrisK.   Thats where I got the idea from!  Roy.      I will be putting it into 2 Shows this year  Sinker.   If you join a carving club, you will get a lot of help with your decoys  GoneFishin.    You dont know what ya can do 'til ya try. A carving club will give you all the help you need   Thanks again, Good People !!
indeed!
HOLY SMOKES!! You've got talent!! Ever thought of selling them??
Thanks for letting us have a look Jack, that's another excellent piece of art you've produced !!  Always enjoy seeing your work.
I always love it when I do get the chance to drop by your place for a visit and see your beautiful work in person. It is truly amazing!
Looks great  Bushart
Wow, nice work Jack!
One of your finest yet Jack! Wonderful work!
Sweet job Jack!!
Very nice Jack... I would love to see some of the other work if you arn't to shy.   Art
